answers.answer: Your first question is answered on the health page:http://www.medhelp.org/health_pages/Hepatitis/HepB-Introduction--Welcome-Page/show/34?cid=153Other specific questions ask your doctor.

question: Does any one got hepatitis B as a adult ( over 16 years) and become chronic?If so kindly tell me other complications / health conditions ( like diabetes, use of birth control pills , other hepatitis viruses etc while on treatment for hepatitis B)  making this virus stay in the blood even after 6 months becoming chronic. This info may be helpful to fellow heppers. Kindly share
title: knowing the virus
